## Marker class

Class for a marker. This is used in keyboard navigation to save a location in the Blockly AST.  Blockly.Marker

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Marker 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)()](./blockly.marker._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new Marker instance. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [colour](./blockly.marker.colour.md) |  | string \| null | The colour of the marker. |
|  [type](./blockly.marker.type.md) |  | string | The type of the marker. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.marker.dispose.md) |  | Dispose of this marker. |
|  [getCurNode()](./blockly.marker.getcurnode.md) |  | Gets the current location of the marker.  The current field, connection, or block the marker is on. |
|  [getDrawer()](./blockly.marker.getdrawer.md) |  | Get the current drawer for the marker.  The object in charge of drawing the marker. |
|  [hide()](./blockly.marker.hide.md) |  | Hide the marker SVG. |
|  [setCurNode(newNode)](./blockly.marker.setcurnode.md) |  | Set the location of the marker and call the update method. Setting isStack to true will only work if the newLocation is the top most output or previous connection on a stack. |
|  [setDrawer(drawer)](./blockly.marker.setdrawer.md) |  | Sets the object in charge of drawing the marker. |
